creator: jnaveen@ltp.soft.net
text:
The "output" attribute of the exec tasks always works in a overwrite mode. 
I think it will be useful to have a mode where it will be possible to 
append to the file specified by the output attribute. 
For example I do a "ls" into a file and then I do a "sum" into the same file. 
The workaround now is to output to many files and then "cat" all of them.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3234 ***
